title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library locations, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary() function:
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() #>                                                                       Library #> 1                                          C:/Program Files/R/R-4.4.1/library #> 2                          C:/Users/KITCHINGT/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.4 #> 3 C:/Users/KITCHINGT/AppData/Local/Temp/1/RtmpmAHEHX/temp_libpathebdc119d62db #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2        100 #> 3          1
